roleOverview: Graphic Designers communicate ideas visually across digital and print media using branding, typography, and composition.
beginnerStage: Learn design fundamentals and color theory
Create posters, social assets, and logo exercises
Build proficiency in Photoshop and Illustrator basics
intermediateStage: Develop brand kits and campaign creatives
Build a portfolio with case studies and rationale
Work on freelance or internship projects with revisions
advancedStage: Lead visual direction for multi-channel campaigns
Own brand consistency across teams and assets
Mentor junior designers and improve design process quality
realWorldProjects: Brand identity system for startup launch
Social media campaign kit with templates
Event marketing collateral across print and digital
salaryInsights: Compensation improves with portfolio quality, brand impact, and ability to deliver high-volume production with consistent quality.
